title.english: Sleepy Princess in the Demon Castle

description:
Sshhh! Princess Syalis is trying to get a good night's sleep. Some shut-eye. Forty winks. Catch some Z's. Long ago in olden times when people and demons lived together in—well, disharmony, really—a demon king kidnaps a human princess and imprisons her in his castle. Bereft, the princess's subjects beat their chests in anguish…until a hero arises to spearhead Project Rescue Our Princess! While waiting for her knight in shining armor, what's an imprisoned princess to do...? Teddy-bear guards with bat wings are all very well, but her dungeon cell is bo-o-o-ring! So, she decides to wile away the long hours by sleeping. Now if only she could get comfortable…and didn't suffer from insomnia...

(Source: VIZ Media)

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Prison
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a prison.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Monster Boy
tags.description: Prominently features a male character who is a part-monster.

tags.name: Dungeon
tags.description: Prominently features a dungeon environment.

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Fairy Tale
tags.description: This work tells a fairy tale, centers around fairy tales, or is based on a classic fairy tale.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Succubus
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a succubus, a creature in medieval folklore that typically uses their sexual prowess to trap and seduce people to feed off them.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

title.native: 魔王城でおやすみミニアニメ

name.native: オーロラ・栖夜・リース・カイミーン
レッドシベリアン・改

node.description: Originating from [Nomad](https://anilist.co/studio/70/), where she initially worked as a production assistant.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YukaliHashimoto) | [Blog (jp)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/marianne_amplifier/)

She is a composer, arranger and synthesizer programmer.
Affiliated with [Doga Kobo](https://anilist.co/studio/95/Doga-Kobo). Sparsely worked as a production assistant earlier in her career.

Affiliated with [Doga Kobo](https://anilist.co/studio/95/Doga-Kobo).

_Note: Not to be confused with [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/166224/)._

[Website](http://www.orsm.jp/) | [Profile (Sinsekai Studio)](https://sinsekaistudio.jp/artist/oresama/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/o_oresama)

ORESAMA is a musical duo that has been active since 2014. Their music is a mix of 80's disco, funk and electro. 

They are currently affiliated with Sinsekai Studio.

**Members:**
- [Pon](https://anilist.co/staff/301227/) (Lead Vo., Lyricist)
-  [Hideya Kojima](https://anilist.co/staff/158432) (Vo., Trackmaker)
